column1: Little Goat Diner////Yo this place is THE SPOT. Little goat but it's a big deal. Let me start off by saying
column3: tabletop finishes to the stainless steel trim and the cognac booths; it highlights and serves as a model for the traditional diner experience. The kitchen
column4: you'd think it's no shave November or Manuary but NO
column6: true specimens of chivalry and brawn
column7: hell I'll take a meal from a guy that could wrestle a bear with his beard any day. The service is sweet
column9: and phenomenal with recommendations. It's fire
column10: quit wasting your time and come get this bread. They serve other things aside from bread. Catch me if you can. -A
